info.name: Google+ Hide +1'd Content
info.description: Hides the content of the "+1'd this post" header and its related post.
info.additionalInfo: Based on the HTML+CSS layout of Google+ as of Friday 07 February 2014.

options.label: Hide completely
options.value: .hf.DX, .hf.DX + * {display: none;} /* Hide "+1'd this post" header and its related post (because we don't need no stinkin' content from people we haven't circled ourselves!) */

options.label: Only show header
options.value:
.hf.DX + * {display: none;} /* Hide post related to "+1'd this post" header */
  .hf.DX:hover + *, .hf.DX + *:hover {display: inherit;} /* Only show post when hovering over the "+1'd this post" header (and its post) */

options.label: Make transparent
options.value:
.hf.DX, .hf.DX + * {opacity: 0.5;}  /* Make the "+1'd this post" header and related post translucent */
  .hf.DX:hover, .hf.DX:hover + *, .hf.DX + *:hover {opacity: inherit;} /* Make the "+1'd this post" header and related post opaque again when hovering over it. */
